item.title: RStudio Snippet - Table to Clipboard
item.description: A common thing I need to do at work is paste a small table into an email or presentation. I’m a bit picky with formatting. I wanted to be able to control shading, borders, and number formatting ($, comma separators, %, # of digits). I can do that really, really quickly in Excel. I haven’t found a quick way to do all of that in R. (see discussion here: https://community.rstudio.com/t/output-nice-looking-formatted-tables/1084)
